Title: Enacts the freedom to read act
Summary: Enacts the "freedom to read act"; requires the commissioner of education and school library systems to develop policies to ensure that school libraries and library staff are empowered to curate and develop collections that provide students with access to the widest array of developmentally appropriate materials available.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "freedom to read act"
